title: KAISERPUNK
description:
Build your city, forge your empire, and conquer the world in Kaiserpunk, the Grand City Builder set in an alternative history from 1918 to 1945 – the ‘Interbellum Era’. After WWI, city-states rise from the ashes , each vying for dominance. Party Club
As a ruler, you’ll manage your city, drive its industrialization, and build a military across land, sea, and air to conquer rivals or defend your territory. With deep production focused city building and warfare on a global scale, the way you develop your city will determine your ability to dominate through war or engage in diplomacy.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel™ Core i5-7400 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050ti / AMD Radeon R7 370
